SELECT q.qna_id, q.created_at, q.qna_re_ref, q.qna_re_lev, q.qna_re_seq, q.qna_subject, q.qna_content, q.qna_readcount, q.qna_exposure_stat, q.qna_answer_status, q.qna_file_name, q.qna_file_origin, q.teacher_id, t.teacher_name, q.student_id, s.student_name, q.course_id, c.course_name, q.class_id, l.class_name FROM qna q JOIN student s ON q.student_id = s.student_id JOIN course c ON q.course_id = c.course_id JOIN class l ON q.class_id = l.class_id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE q.deleted_at IS NULL AND q.academy_id = #{academyId} ORDER BY q.created_at DESC LIMIT #{end} OFFSET #{start};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT q.qna_id, q.created_at, q.qna_re_ref, q.qna_re_lev, q.qna_re_seq, q.qna_subject, q.qna_content, q.qna_readcount, q.qna_exposure_stat, q.qna_answer_status, q.qna_file_name, q.qna_file_origin, q.teacher_id, t.teacher_name, q.student_id, s.student_name, q.course_id, c.course_name, q.class_id, l.class_name FROM qna q JOIN student s ON q.student_id = s.student_id JOIN course c ON q.course_id = c.course_id JOIN class l ON q.class_id = l.class_id JOIN teacher t ON q.teacher_id = t.teacher_id ) as temp WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_id, created_at, qna_re_ref, qna_re_lev, qna_re_seq, qna_subject, qna_password ,qna_content, qna_readcount, qna_exposure_stat, qna_answer_status, qna_file_name, qna_file_origin, teacher_id, course_id, class_id, student_id, academy_id) VALUES (#{qnaId}, NOW(), #{qnaReRef}, #{qnaReLev}, 1, #{qnaSubject}, #{qnaPassword} ,#{qnaContent}, 0, #{qnaExposureStat}, #{qnaAnswerStatus}, #{qnaFileName}, #{qnaFileOrigin}, #{teacherId}, #{courseId}, #{classId}, #{studentId}, #{academyId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna WHERE qna_re_ref = (SELECT qna_re_ref FROM qna WHERE qna_id = #{id} AND qna_re_lev = 0) AND qna_re_lev > 0 AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qna_subject = #{qnaSubject}, qna_content = #{qnaContent}, qna_file_name = #{qnaFileName}, qna_file_origin = #{qnaFileOrigin}, qna_exposure_stat = #{qnaExposureStat} WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
